message: Does anyone think applying to Y Combinator is a good idea?
I am just 16 years old and I am just starting to learn about computer programming. I am planning on majoring in computer science in college.
@ambarathooni JavaScript is a good language to start with at the moment, take a look at this: http://www.bubblefoundry.com/blog/2011/01/introduction-to-programming/

@ambarathooni if you want to get started quickly with writing server side webapps and not only JavaScript within the browser, then also check out http://akshell.com (disclosure: I'm helping out the startup)
